programme.title: Cleasan Ataidh & Tilidh/The...
programme.desc: ...Adventures of Abney & Teal. 11/52. Everybody is bored. Abney builds a train so they can go on a tour.

programme.title: Sionnach agus Maigheach (Fox & Hare)
programme.desc: 18/26. A heatwave has struck the forest. Fed up with the high temperatures, Ping Wing decides to pack her bags and go back to her original home, the South Pole.

programme.title: An Teaghlach Rìoghail an...
programme.desc: ...Ath-dhoras/The Royals Next Door. 21/52. Tha Stella le car na h-adhbrann is tha aire gach neach oirre. Stella has a sprained ankle and everyone is paying her lots of attention.

programme.title: An Teaghlach Rìoghail an...
programme.desc: ...Ath-dhoras/The Royals Next Door. 22/52. Tha Stella air cuireadh fhaighinn gu dìnnear. Stella has been invited to dinner.

programme.title: Stri
programme.desc: 3/12. Tha Ehrinn a' farpais an aghaidh preasantairean CBBC ALBA ach saoil cò shoirbhicheas? Ehrinn competes against the CBBC ALBA presenters, but who will emerge victorious?

programme.title: A-null 's a-nall
programme.desc: 3/7. Chan e cait a-mhàin a bhios a' sreap am broinn mhàileidean fosgailt'! It's not only cats who climb inside open suitcases!

programme.title: An Là
programme.desc: Naidheachdan ionadail, nàiseanta is eadar-nàiseanta gach là cuide ri fiosrachadh coimhearsnachd bho BBC ALBA. Local, national and international news and information from BBC ALBA.

programme.title: Dluth Bhearradh/Wallace & Gromit in A Close Shave
programme.desc: Having escaped the rustling truck, a little lamb makes his way to Wallace and Gromit's house and trouble ensues when the unlikely rustlers discover his whereabouts.

programme.title: Cearcall
programme.desc: 3/12. Sgrìob tron phrògram aithriseach Cearcall a bh' air an telebhisean deireadh nan 70an. A nostalgic look back at material from the current affairs series of the late 1970s and 80s.

programme.title: Miann na Maighdinn-mara/Mermaid Tales
programme.desc: 3/4. Kate looks on as her brother Seumas tests out his speedboat and she learns about a 19th-century shipwreck.

programme.title: Eòrpa/European Current Affairs
programme.desc: 9/16. Roddy Munro's 2010 report, first broadcast 15 years after the completion of the controversial Skye Bridge. Roddy also examines the impact of the Scalpay Bridge and Eriskay Causeway.

programme.title: Mach à Seo! - An Roinn Eòrpa
programme.desc: 1/6. Ramsay visits Vienna for some Christmas magic. Ramsay a' dèanamh gàirdeachas ri gnothaichean Nollaig ann a Vienna.

programme.title: Dàna | Scotland's Wild Side
programme.desc: 2/4. Coinneach Rankin and Annie MacNeil head to the ancient oasis town of Tafraoute to climb challenging routes in the shadow of the Anti-Atlas Mountains.

programme.title: Cuirm@Celtic Connections:...
programme.desc: ...Capercaillie & The BBC SSO. Capercaillie and The BBC SSO collaborate in a performance at Glasgow Royal Concert Hall.

programme.title: Ceol Sith
programme.desc: Come on a thrilling journey into the world of fairies and folklore with Ingrid Henderson.

programme.title: Rurachd (Foraging)
programme.desc: 3/6. Mary Ann and Lucy explore plants that thrive at the edge, from cycle paths to farmyards and wild garden corners.

programme.title: OMC!
programme.desc: 2/4. Claudia Winkleman fronts BBC ALBA's 'Na Traoidhdearan', and Jordan still struggles with the official language of his office!

programme.title: Sgeulachd Cogaidh na h-Artaig:...
programme.desc: ...An Cogadh Fuar/Untold Arctic Wars: The Cold War. 2/6. The demand for intelligence is immense, and spy balloons and planes... Contains some scenes which some viewers may find upsetting.

programme.title: The Absence of War - Screen Two
programme.desc: Political drama written by David Hare and starring John Thaw. Labour leader George Jones battles with his party on the campaign trail of a general election. Contains some strong language.

programme.title: Masters of the Canvas - Arena
programme.desc: When pop artist Peter Blake confessed that his fantasy was to be the mysterious masked wrestler Kendo Nagasaki, little did he know what the consequences would be. From 1992.

programme.title: Weatherman Walking: Dylan's Walks
programme.desc: 1/2. Derek Brockway walks in Dylan Thomas's footsteps around Swansea before heading to the Llansteffan Peninsula and the Three Rivers estuary.

programme.title: Canal Boat Diaries
programme.desc: 1/4. Robbie begins his 300-mile adventure across the north of England and the Midlands. He is forced to make a running repair while on the Tinsley lock flight.

programme.title: Archaeology: A Secret History
programme.desc: 3/3. A look at how attention turned from civilisation and kings to the search for the common man against a background of science and competing political ideologies.

programme.title: Thatcher: A Very British Revolution
programme.desc: 5/5. Splits in Mrs Thatcher's cabinet and public anger lead to her eventual downfall.

programme.desc: Jimmy Carr hosts as Rob Beckett and Aisling Bea are joined by competing panellists Kerry Godliman, Georgia Toffolo, Kiri Pritchard-McLean and Fin Taylor.

programme.title: Mock the Week
programme.desc: Dara O Briain and Hugh Dennis feature in a special edition of the topical comedy show featuring fond favourites, outtakes, and other previously unseen bits.

programme.title: Would I Lie To You?
programme.desc: At Christmas: Rob Brydon hosts a festive edition of the comedy panel show, with Henry Blofeld, Kerry Howard, the Rev Richard Coles and Clive Myrie joining captains David Mitchell and Lee Mack.

programme.title: Would I Lie To You?
programme.desc: Rob Brydon, Lee Mack and David Mitchell are joined by Bob Mortimer, Samantha Morton, Miles Jupp and Sarah Hadland.

programme.title: Release the Hounds
programme.desc: Cheshire housewives Dawn Ward, Lauren Simon and Tanya Bardsley take on an evil Soviet comedian, a medical experiment gone wrong, and a terrifying clown.

programme.title: Cannonball UK

programme.title: Storage Hunters UK
programme.desc: Lincolnshire: The smash-hit show where bargain hunters tussle for storage lots like it was Black Friday. Linda is sure one of the units contains something out of this world.

programme.title: Storage Hunters UK
programme.desc: Birmingham: The fiercely fought auction show that provides 'lots' of entertainment. Ione loses her rag with Linda. Heavy D and Sam team up to combine their clout and cash.

programme.title: Railroad Australia
programme.desc: Documentary series. A new V/Line VLocity train is driven to its limits to pass its final test, and the ageing Savannahlander railcar faces one of Australia's roughest tracks.

programme.title: Railroad Australia
programme.desc: Documentary series. Pacific National's Steel Train battles the Nullarbor to deliver its vital cargo across Australia, and a broken loco gets master mechanic Mick steaming.

programme.title: Red Bull Soapbox Race
programme.desc: Brazil: Teams of amateur racers design and build their own gravity-powered soapbox vehicles and race them against the clock, in an extreme downhill battle in front of thousands of fans.

programme.title: Red Bull Soapbox Race
programme.desc: Helsinki: Intrepid gravity-fuelled Soapbox Racers take on Observatory Hill overlooking Helsinki Harbour. How will they handle the brutal berm, the car wash and the ferocious kickers?

programme.title: Guy Martin's Great British Power Trip
programme.desc: Guy Martin investigates the past, present and future of British power stations and how the UK makes its most valuable commodity of all - electricity.

programme.title: Extreme Fishing with Robson Green

programme.desc: Revisit 2: Gordon Ramsay revisits four restaurants he tried to help: the Spanish Pavillion in New Jersey, and Kingston Café, La Frite and Capri in California.

programme.title: Ramsay's Kitchen Nightmares USA
programme.desc: La Galleria 33 (Part 1/2): Gordon tries to help La Galleria 33, run by sisters Rita and Lisa, who blame the restaurant's failures on everything from tablecloths to the weather.

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Left Behind: Flanders loses his job and comes to work with Homer at the power plant. Homer prays for him to be fired.

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Throw Grampa from the Dane: The Simpsons visit Denmark and all fall in love with it - except Homer. Meanwhile, Grampa needs a serious operation.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: The Clean Room Infiltration: Amy hosts a Victorian Christmas Eve dinner, complete with party games. Raj, Leonard and Howard have pigeon problems.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: The Space Probe Disintegration: Howard tries to calm a stressed Raj, who is anxiously awaiting the arrival of some data from a space probe that he helped launch.

programme.title: Modern Family
programme.desc: When a Tree Falls: Mitch helps Cam to save an old tree in the park, while Jay and Manny go beyond their comfort zones at a kid's Olympics-themed birthday party.

programme.title: Modern Family
programme.desc: Diamond in the Rough: When Manny and Luke's little league team unexpectedly makes it into a playoff game, Claire and Cameron scramble to find a location for it.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: The Novelization Correlation: Amy appears on the Professor Proton show. Penny hates the idea that the female protagonist in Leonard's novel is based on her.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: The Neonatal Nomenclature: Bernadette's friends try various tactics to help her go into labour.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: The Athenaeum Allocation: Leonard jumps through hoops to secure the perfect wedding venue for Sheldon and Amy. Howard and Bernadette face a big decision.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: The Gates Excitation: The guys do everything in their power to meet Bill Gates when his firm has dealings with the pharmaceutical company Penny works for.

programme.title: Brooklyn Nine-Nine
programme.desc: Valloweaster: It's heist time. The squad compete for the title of the greatest human/genius.

programme.title: Brooklyn Nine-Nine
programme.desc: Ransom: Holt asks for Jake's help in a case that's exceptionally meaningful to him. Charles and Terry work together on a side business.

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: The Dad-Feelings Limited: As Comic Book Guy and his wife Kumiko debate whether to have a baby, his awesome origin story is revealed.

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Diary Queen: Bart finds his old teacher's diary and learns a surprising secret. Then Lisa discovers an even bigger surprise.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: The Propagation Proposition: Penny's ex-boyfriend Zack and his wife want a baby, but when they encounter fertility problems, they ask Leonard for his help.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: The Confirmation Polarization: Sheldon and Amy are thrilled when their super-asymmetry theory is proved correct. Bernadette enjoys some big success at work.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: The Meteorite Manifestation: Sheldon is thrilled to help Howard and Bernadette with some bureaucratic paperwork, until he realises that they're breaking the law.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: The Donation Oscillation: Penny attempts to sabotage Leonard's efforts to help her ex-boyfriend Zack and his wife Marissa have a family of their own.

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Rome-Old & Juli-eh: Homer stops paying for Grampa's retirement home, so he has to stay with the family instead. In a twist no one saw coming, Grampa ends up marrying Selma.

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Homerazzi: Homer becomes a paparazzo to get money to pay for fire damage to the house. But Springfield's celebrities are alarmed by his aggressive style and fight back.

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: The Musk Who Fell to Earth: Elon Musk turns up in Springfield, befriends Homer and revolutionises the nuclear power plant - which costs Mr Burns dearly...

programme.title: New: Hollyoaks Does Come Dine
programme.desc: with Me: Brand new series: Charlie Wernham hosts an East End night, in a portable kitchen, on the Hollyoaks set! Let's hope his seafood isn't damp squib! And who's won the week? (Ep5/5)

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Treehouse of Horror VII: It's Halloween! Settle down for a night of Springfield spookiness. Bart finds his evil twin in the attic, and Lisa becomes God to a race of tiny people.

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Treehouse of Horror XVI: The Homer-fied horror continues. Bart is replaced by a well-behaved robot. Homer takes part in a deadly TV show. Lisa turns into Albert Einstein.

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Treehouse of Horror XIX: The sinister Simpsons action continues. Homer encounters a murderous rigged voting machine. Lisa's toy car and a vengeful pumpkin get a bit deadly too.

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Treehouse of Horror XXII: It's no trick - we're treating you to more scary Simpsons. Homer is paralysed by a spider, and Flanders is transformed into a cold-blooded vigilante.

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Treehouse of Horror XXV: The spine-chilling Springfieldian stories continue, with Bart and Lisa in an evil alternate universe, and Moe's terrifying Clockwork Orange-style gang.

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Treehouse of Horror XXVIII: Get your head out of the apple bobbing bucket and in front of E4, as the Simpsons become Halloween candy, and Maggie needs an exorcism.

programme.title: A Quiet Place Part II
programme.desc: (2020) Hushed-horror sequel with Emily Blunt and Cillian Murphy. Armed only with a hearing aid, can the family evade the vicious aliens with super-hearing, and find a community to live in?

programme.title: Hollyoaks Does Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Brand new series: Charlie Wernham hosts an East End night, in a portable kitchen, on the Hollyoaks set! Let's hope his seafood isn't damp squib! And who's won the week? (Ep5/5)

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Treehouse of Horror XXXI: The terror-themed trilogy includes the 2020 US election, Pixar and Spider-Man: Into the Spider-Verse parodies, and Lisa's birthday.

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Undercover Burns: Mr Burns goes undercover to see what the employees really think of him, and becomes their friends - to Smithers' alarm...

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Revenge Is a Dish Best Served Three Times: Homer's misguided revenge on Cletus combined with an untimely car breakdown leaves the Simpsons telling tales of revenge gone wrong.

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Treehouse of Horror VII: Bart finds his evil twin in the attic, Lisa becomes God to a race of tiny people, and Kang and Kodos assume the identities of Bill Clinton and Bob Dole.

programme.title: Below Deck Sailing Yacht
programme.desc: The Bitter End: The final night out goes as smoothly as you'd expect when things heat up as the crew say their final goodbyes.

programme.title: Modern Family
programme.desc: In Your Head: Luke goes missing after a night out. Can Manny, Phil and Gloria find him? Haley tries to land an interview with the creator of a big lifestyle website.

programme.title: The Neighborhood
programme.desc: Welcome to the Vow Renewal: The Johnsons decide to help Calvin and Tina have the wedding they missed out on the first time.

programme.title: The Neighborhood
programme.desc: Welcome to Bowling: Calvin and Dave team up for a chance at bowling championship glory. Gemma and Tina face off.

programme.title: The Neighborhood
programme.desc: Welcome to the Dealbreaker: Gemma sets a reluctant Malcolm up on a blind date with a teacher at her school.

programme.title: The Goldbergs
programme.desc: The Hunt for the Great Albino Pumpkin: Adam is tired of Halloween. Barry and Joanne meet Elvira, Mistress of the Dark.

programme.title: The Goldbergs
programme.desc: The Rose-Kissy Thing: Beverly encourages Principal Ball to establish a non-athlete Senior Night. Erica struggles to appoint a pre-wedding 'fun captain'.

programme.title: The Goldbergs
programme.desc: A Light Thanksgiving Nosh: Beverly feels threatened by Linda Schwartz's plan to host Thanksgiving.

programme.title: The Goldbergs
programme.desc: Tennis People: Great news! Adam's accepted into NYU. Terrible news: Brea has a place at a school far away.

programme.title: The Goldbergs
programme.desc: You Only Die Once, or Twice, But Never Three Times: Barry enlists Adam and his friends to create a James Bond-themed home movie to help him impress Joanne.

programme.title: Made in Chelsea
programme.desc: Brand new series: Beks and Sam Prince get cosy in the Cotswolds, but have they crossed a line? Livvy's torn between Kit and Chuggs. Sam Vanderpump is rocked by life-changing news.

programme.title: Ramsay's Kitchen Nightmares USA
programme.desc: Charlie's: Gordon Ramsay visits Italian bistro Charlie's, where the pasta's soggy, the lasagne's a liability and the chef can't even cook a meatball.

programme.title: Ramsay's Kitchen Nightmares USA
programme.desc: Café Hon: The Café Hon restaurant in Baltimore is struggling because its owner has alienated the local community. Can Gordon help?

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: The Anxiety Optimization: When Sheldon gets stuck in a rut with his research, he asks his friends to cure his mental block by raising his stress levels.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: The Troll Manifestation: Leonard and Sheldon co-publish a physics paper but are forced to defend themselves against negative comments from an online critic.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: The Comic Book Store Regeneration: The gang prepare for the reopening of Stuart's comic book shop. Penny teaches Sheldon to 'let it go' when he is irritated.

programme.title: Sonic the Hedgehog
programme.desc: (2020) Madcap adventure-comedy video game adaptation with Jim Carrey and Ben Schwartz. Can nippy ring-chasing hedgehog Sonic escape the clutches of an evil, moustachioed scientist?

programme.title: The Great New Year Bake Off
programme.desc: 2021 Bake Off finalist Chigs, 2020's Lottie and Manon and 2018's Antony compete to become Star Baker, before seeing the New Year in with a Riverdance performance.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: The Intimacy Acceleration: When the gang hear about an experiment designed to make participants fall in love, Sheldon and Penny put it to the test as a joke.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: The Colonization Application: Amy learns that Sheldon has applied to take part in a one-way mission to colonise Mars. Leonard surprises Penny with a gift.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: The Leftover Thermalization: A power cut at Mrs Wolowitz's house defrosts the last meal she prepared before her death, so the gang consume it in her honour.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: The Skywalker Incursion: When Leonard and Sheldon are invited to speak at Berkeley, they take a detour during the journey to try to meet one of their idols.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: The Fortification Implementation: When Sheldon and Amy build a blanket fort, they come to a major crossroads in their relationship. Howard meets his half-brother.

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Little Big Girl: Lisa invents fragments of her family's history to impress her classmates, but feels guilty about lying. Bart thinks he's got a girl pregnant by kissing her.

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Springfield Up: Famous filmmaker Declan Desmond (voiced by Eric Idle) comes to Springfield to chronicle the lives of its residents for his series Growing Up Springfield.

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Yokel Chords: In a parody of The Sound of Music, Lisa tutors Cletus's seven children. But when Krusty spots their singing talent, he snaps them up for his circus.

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Rome-Old & Juli-eh: Homer stops paying for Grampa's retirement home, so he has to stay with the family instead. In a twist no one saw coming, Grampa ends up marrying Selma.

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Homerazzi: Homer becomes a paparazzo to get money to pay for fire damage to the house. But Springfield's celebrities are alarmed by his aggressive style and fight back.

programme.title: Celebrity Gogglebox
programme.desc: The celebs watch Stranger Things, Love Island, Paul Hollywood Eats... Mexico, How to Build a Sex Room, Long Lost Family, Countdown and BBC News (a PM resignation).

programme.title: Gogglebox
programme.desc: The Goggleboxers watch The Great Celebrity Bake Off for SU2C, Hunted, One Day, Anton & Giovanni's Adventures in Spain, Married at First Sight Australia and more.

programme.title: Angel Has Fallen
programme.desc: (2019) Action-thriller sequel. Secret agent Mike Banning (Gerard Butler) goes on the run when he's framed for an attack on the President. Can he clear his name?

programme.title: Isolation
programme.desc: (2005) Gory horror with John Lynch, Essie Davis and Sean Harris. Biotech experiments bring bloody mayhem to a struggling Irish dairy farm.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Teleshopping.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Teleshopping.

programme.title: Siege at Red River
programme.desc: (1954) Western. Van Johnson stars as a Confederate agent who steals a Gatling gun prototype from the Yankees and attempts to smuggle it south through enemy lines to his own side.

programme.title: The Enemy Below
programme.desc: (1957) Second World War thriller. Robert Mitchum stars as the captain of a US destroyer in the North Atlantic hunting down a German U-boat and its world-weary captain, Curt Jurgens.

programme.title: The Colditz Story
programme.desc: (1954) Classic Second World War drama. John Mills, Lionel Jeffries and Bryan Forbes star as just some of the POWs determined to break out of the infamous German 'escape-proof' prison.

programme.title: Jubal
programme.desc: (1956) Western with Glenn Ford, Ernest Borgnine, Rod Steiger and Valerie French. A cowboy is given a job by a rancher, sparking lethal jealousy in a colleague and desire in the boss's wife.

programme.title: Sister Act 2: Back in the Habit
programme.desc: (1993) Comedy sequel starring Whoopi Goldberg and Lauryn Hill. Deloris - who's now made it big in Vegas - goes back undercover as a teacher to help a struggling school choir find its voice.

programme.title: Copshop
programme.desc: (2021) Action thriller with Gerard Butler. A hitman gets himself arrested so that he can get to a bad guy, who also got himself arrested, so that he could hide from the hitman.

programme.title: Alita: Battle Angel
programme.desc: (2019) Partially animated action film based on a popular manga comic. Alita, a deadly cyborg brought back to life by a mourning scientist, sets out to discover her true identity.

programme.title: Corpus Christi
programme.desc: (2019) Crime drama. A young ex-con wants to be a priest so much that he pretends to be one. But trouble soon finds him. In Polish/subs. Strong language/violence/sex/drugs.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Teleshopping.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Teleshopping.

programme.title: The Man Between
programme.desc: (1953) Atmospheric thriller set in post-war Berlin, where Ivo Kern (James Mason) and Susanne Mallison (Claire Bloom) get caught up in a maelstrom of bigamy, blackmail and bullets.

programme.title: Gideon of Scotland Yard
programme.desc: (1958) Drama. Jack Hawkins stars as Police Inspector Gideon, who faces outrage and danger in his quest to bring London's criminals to justice. With Anna Massey, John Loder and Cyril Cusack.

programme.title: Footsteps in the Fog
programme.desc: (1955) Atmospheric Victorian melodrama. Stewart Granger plays a sinister aristocrat who poisons his wife. However, his maid (Jean Simmons) knows his secret and tries to use it against him.

programme.title: Dead of Night
programme.desc: (1945) Five uncanny tales of the supernatural in one eerie package, the most famous starring ventriloquist Michael Redgrave and a deadly dummy. Prepare to be spooked.

programme.title: Lemony Snicket's A Series of...
programme.desc: ...Unfortunate Events: (2004) Gothic family comedy starring Jim Carrey as the evil, scheming Count Olaf, who'll do whatever it takes to deprive three young orphans of their inheritance.

programme.title: The Pope's Exorcist
programme.desc: (2023) Supernatural horror starring Russell Crowe, loosely based on the memoirs of a 'real' exorcist. A case of demonic possession in Spain connects to dark secrets from the Inquisition.

programme.title: Warlock
programme.desc: (1989) Fantasy horror with Julian Sands and Richard E Grant. Using magic, an evil warlock flees to 80s LA from the olde-worlde. Can he unmake creation before a witch-finder tracks him down?

programme.title: The Masque of the Red Death
programme.desc: (1964) Horror with Vincent Price and Jane Asher, based on an Edgar Allen Poe story. Satanist Prince Prospero treats people like puppets. But he can't escape the coming plague.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Teleshopping.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Teleshopping.

programme.title: Dr Who and the Daleks
programme.desc: (1965) A spin-off of the cult television series starring Peter Cushing. Backyard-inventor Dr Who finds himself stuck on the irradiated planet Skaro, home of the cold and metallic Daleks.

programme.title: Playing with Fire
programme.desc: (2019) Fun-filled family comedy starring John Cena. A macho fireman has to babysit three impish kids after saving them from a blaze in the remote California woodlands.

programme.title: Spider-Man: Into the Spider-Verse
programme.desc: (2018) Oscar-winning animated superhero adventure with the voices of Shameik Moore, Kathryn Hahn and Nicolas Cage. Can a gang of Spider-heroes save the universe from reality-bending chaos?

programme.title: Jerry & Marge Go Large
programme.desc: (2022) Fact-based comedy starring Bryan Cranston and Annette Bening as a retired couple who find a way to exploit a lottery loophole. But then some rich kids try to muscle in...

programme.title: G.I. Joe: The Rise of Cobra
programme.desc: (2009) Action adventure with Channing Tatum, Sienna Miller and Christopher Eccleston. Terrorists steal a devastating weapon and only the USA's finest - the GI Joes - can stop them.

programme.title: M3GAN
programme.desc: (2022) Creepy-doll horror with Allison Williams. A robotics engineer simultaneously invents an AI dolly and takes on the care of her orphaned niece. But can a cyborg really raise a kid?

programme.title: Venom: Let There Be Carnage
programme.desc: (2021) Tom Hardy returns as Marvel's gnarly antihero, to face a symbiote spawned from Venom's own blood living inside a serial killer who looks just like Woody Harrelson. Yikes.

programme.title: Late Night with the Devil
programme.desc: (2023) Unsettling found-footage horror with David Dastmalchian. A has-been host tries to save his 70s talk show using a demonically possessed 13-year-old girl. Really, what could go wrong?

programme.title: Angel Has Fallen
programme.desc: (2019) Action-thriller sequel. Secret agent Mike Banning (Gerard Butler) goes on the run when he's framed for an attack on the President. Can he clear his name?
